medium: Woodblock print (benizuri-e); ink and limited color on paper
title: Sanogawa Ichimatsu
marks:
虚無僧乃
顔を見せたる
暑さかな

Komuso_ no 
Kao wo mise tar Torii Kiyohiro ga
description: The actor Sanogawa Ichimatsu as Karigane Bunshichi in the play Gonin otoko kariba no kado ide 五人男狩場首途, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the third month of 1756. Part of a diptych.
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
